name: htmx-todomvc
description: Example of an HTMX application which works offline first

scripts.start: npm run clean && npm run static && esbuild --format=esm --watch --outdir=public --bundle --servedir=public ./src/sw.ts
scripts.static: [ -d "public" ] || mkdir public && cd src && cp --parents `find . -name '*.js' -o -name '*.html' -o -name '*.css'` ../public && cd .. && npm run htmx && npm run todo && npm run iife

author: Jon Nyman
